Description:

Heroic epic genre hack'n'slash takes you into a fantasy world for decades tormented by a bloody war. 
Kingdom of humans, elves and dwarves are in ruins, around rampant looters and robbers. And among this 
chaos rears its head a new, mysterious and powerful evil. Each kingdom sends envoys to find out what 
the nature of the new threats and how to resist it. The mission of this extremely dangerous and difficult, 
and most likely - and does Impossible ... Well, what about you? And you simply find yourself ugorazdilo in 
the wrong place at the wrong time ... Or maybe just the opposite?
In this story, you are free to choose the role of a mighty warrior, mage or dark huntress, fluent onions. 
Alone or with a friend for a couple of you will go on a deadly journey around the world RAW, which promises 
a lot of interesting adventures and brutal battles.

Features:

Three heroes. Warrior, mage or hunter - each of them will take their way in the world RAW, each will gain 
experience in their own way. The former has great strength, he used to go ahead and act rashly. 
The second prefers to destroy enemies with fireballs and lightning. The third relies on his own agility, 
accurate bow and sharp dagger. Choose who you closer in spirit!
Weapons on hand. Depending on the character you get weapons, items and abilities, including magic 
that will improve as you progress through the game. And of course, everything that belonged to the 
defeated enemies will become your lawful prey.

Combat power. With each win the battle you will gain strength and discover a new abilities, some of 
them allow you to destroy dozens of enemies! However, more and more will become enemies ... Will 
you be able to stand against the hordes of rampaging monsters, ready to destroy you at all costs?
Submission shower. In constant struggle with a lot of enemies of all good. The most valuable gift 
will be the ability of transformation, which will allow you to become implanted in the body 
vanquished monsters and use all their skills and power. Do not deny yourself the pleasure to 
penetrate into the enemy camp and walk on it devastating hurricane!

Combat Brotherhood. Invite a friend to join you in the exciting fantasy universe travels on the network 
or a computer. Perhaps that's teamwork will ensure the successful completion of a difficult 
and dangerous undertaking.
